interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Stretch Mark Cream (4oz) - Best treatment to Reduce & Prevent stretch marks - Intensive moisturizing & hydrating formula with Natural Ingredients - Used during Pregnancy & After Birth - For Women & Men Review Date: 2015/03/12 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '5.81 x 2.37 x 1.5 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '616639258202'} Review Text: I have lost a considerable amount of weight throughout the years, because it was imperative for me to maintain a healthy weight due to the fact that I used to have full blown type 2 diabetes. With weight loss or weight gain comes stretch marks. I am very happy that I was given a chance to try Luxy Beauty Care's Stretch Mark Cream. I have been religiously using it on my thighs and I can honestly say that I am very happy with the results that I got. Two thumps up for this product!

I received one or more of the products mentioned above for review purposes. Regardless, I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe will be good for others. I’m just a regular consumer and I appreciate reading and giving honest feedback about products that regular people like me use on a daily basis or consider buying. My views and opinions are from a customer/end user’s standpoint. Review Title: I am very happy that I was given a chance to try Luxy ... Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
La Deessa Powerful 20% Vitamin C Serum For Face +11% Hyaluronic, Organic Anti Aging Skin Care. Hydrate, Moisturize, Increase Collagen, Reduce Fine Lines, Hyper pigmentation & Acne. La Deessa ['La Deessa products are the answer to compromised skin structure & integrity. With the utmost respect for our eco system, La Deessa sustainably combines Natural, Organic, Plant Based and Wild Crafted Botanicals with clinically proven & independently peer reviewed superstar natural and organic age-defying ingredients with highly effective delivery systems to create results-driven anti aging skin care products. KEY INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS: ALOE VERA increases your body’s production of collagen and is packed with essential vitamins including A, B1, B2, B6, B12, C & E. Aloe penetrates skin four-times (4x) more rapidly than water and accelerates skin cell reproduction by as much as eight-times (8x)! VITAMIN C supports every aspect of collagen production from stem cell activity to improving the structural integrity, resilience and stability of the skin. Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate is an extremely stable and gentle Vitamin C derivative and a precursor to Vitamin C; it waits to convert into Ascorbic Acid until it is fully absorbed, at which time the sodium molecules separate, converting it into pure Vitamin C deep within your skin...this prevents irritation and amplifies antioxidant benefits, making Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate a superior form of Vitamin C in cosmetic formulations. HYALURONIC ACID has the unique ability to hold more than 1000 times its weight in water, allowing the skin to retain more water. Amazingly, hyaluronic acid adjusts its moisture absorption to your skin’s need for moisture making it ideal for all skin types. Hyaluronic acid also protects the epidermis by scavenging reactive oxygen species generated by ultra violet light. Our formulations contain high percentages of Hyaluronic Acid. MSM- METHYL SULPHONYL MTHANE (ORGANIC SULFUR) Dubbed the “Beauty Mineral” Organic sulfur is referred to as the “Beauty Mineral” because it promotes oxygen transport across cell membranes (intracellular) facilitating cellular regeneration…resulting in skin that is more beautiful.'] {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Fragrance Free', 'Brand': 'La Deessa', 'Item Form': 'liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Gluten Free, Natural, Vegan', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2 x 2 inches; 3 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LD-VITAC20', 'UPC': '040232150944', 'Manufacturer': 'La Deessa'} I have very dry and sensitive skin and read so many good things about Vitamin C Serum. This particular brand has been working very good for me - I have been using it at night and I have been loving it so far!

Please do check my in depth blog review on this product: http://wp.me/p1u6bQ-fB

Disclaimer: I received one or more of the products mentioned above for free - for review purposes. Regardless, I only recommend products or services I use personally and believe will be good for my readers. I'm just a regular consumer and I appreciate reading and giving honest feedback about products that regular people like me use on a daily basis or consider buying. My views and opinions are from a customer/end user's standpoint. Loving this serum! Yalmeh Naturals Eye Bright Gel Yalmeh Peerless Beauty ["Yalmeh Glory Eye Bright Gel ranks as a superior Anti Aging product for all your skin. It is extremely effective at eliminating dark circles and wrinkles. It is also efficient for puffiness and loss of tone. SAFE, ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS- Yalmeh Glory Eye Bright Gel contains all natural ingredients, no toxic chemicals or cancer causing additives - no mineral oil, sulfates or alcohol ,propylene glycol or paraben. We do not test our products on animals NEVER-EVER. This is the BEST EYE GEL and is an effective natural solution for all types of skin. And, it lasts forever - a little goes a long way. And what matters most, however, is that the Yalmeh Glory Eye Gel works incredibly well. You will feel better both inside and out. THIS EYE GEL is 100% natural & 75% organic Click the 'Add to Cart' button at the top of this page NOW - Your Eyes Will Thank You."] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.4 x 0.4 x 0.4 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GEBG-Y005', 'UPC': '640671981439 885612923240', 'Manufacturer': 'SETAF'} I have tried other Yalmeh products in the past and have been very happy with the results that I got. Needless to say, I had high hopes when I started using this eye gel. I was and still am very impressed with how well it works for my sensitive undereye area, as it really reduces the puffiness under my eyes that I am perpetually plagued with, when I wake up in the morning. It is also working so well as far as hydrating my eye area goes! This product and brand always delivers the results that I am hoping to get from skin care products. Love this brand and product!

You will also notice your skin is tingling and a little bit more rosy as it is reinvigorated.', 'Week 1:', 'After about a week of use, you will start to notice a drastic reduction in the visibility of dark spots, fine lines, wrinkles and bags under your eyes. Your skin will be smoother and firmer on a constant basis, not just in the morning.', 'Week 2:', 'As you continue to use the product, you will notice that the deeper wrinkles—such as the ones around your forehead and smile lines—will start to fade away. The saggy skin around your jowls and neck will have gradually reduced and in some cases, completely disappeared. Your skin will “snap back” when pulled, giving you the elasticity you had when you were much, much younger.', 'Absolutely NO fillers, NO binders, NO artificial ingredients and GLUTEN-FREE', 'ARE YOU EXCITED TO:', '-Instantly reverse signs of aging -Vanish fine lines and wrinkles -Reduce the appearance of age spots -Get rid of bags under your eyes -Firm and lift facial skin', 'Click the', 'ADD TO CART', 'button now to get this Skin Care Miracle in a Bottle!', 'NOTE: This product is specifically designed for men and women that NEED TO LOSE MORE THAN 10 YEARS OFF OF THEIR APPEARANCE'] {'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Combination, Normal', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 2.8 x 2.1 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Skin_Care_Bundle'} Vitamin C Serum and Phytoceramides - my favorite skin combo! I have been getting a lot of compliments on my skin lately and it's all thanks to these products! I don't think I'll ever give this combo up, as it has truly helped with my issues regarding skin dryness. It's well priced and most importantly, it delivers the results that it guarantees to give. This winter has been tremendously harsh on my skin and I don't know what I would have done, without these products. Go check it out - it's worth all the hype!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Concerns:** Focus on dry and sensitive skin with an emphasis on hydration and anti-aging benefits. Recently found satisfaction with products addressing stretch marks, emphasizing effective moisture and skin recovery during weight fluctuations.

- **Product Preferences:** Strong preference for organic, natural, and eco-friendly skincare products, particularly those offering intensive hydration and natural ingredients. Values effective components such as Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, while prioritizing 100% natural and cruelty-free formulations free from toxic chemicals. Continues to show interest in stylish cosmetic and jewelry accessories that align with her personal aesthetic.

- **Usage Behavior:** Prefers applying serums and treatments at night, indicating a commitment to a restorative skincare routine. Actively explores targeted treatments, including those for body concerns, and has an ongoing interest in body adornments.

- **Research-Oriented:** Engages thoroughly with product information before purchase, placing importance on customer reviews and genuine testimonials. Demonstrated deep engagement with product effectiveness through recent enthusiastic reviews.

- **Honest Feedback:** Provides authentic, straightforward reviews based on personal experience, reinforcing trust and transparency in her recommendations.

- **Brand Values:** Drawn to brands emphasizing sustainability and holistic skin health. Consistently seeks products that align with her values, highlighting cruelty-free practices and natural ingredient support while appreciating those that enhance her overall aesthetic.

Overall, the user exemplifies a dedication to effective, natural skincare solutions and stylish accessories that cater to her specific skin concerns and values.
